pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Zach Stewart; Victor Martinez is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .987 OPS against them this season and .879 against everything else.
Zach Stewart is still attacking Victor Martinez with the slider even though Martinez hit one for a double last time up.
